title: [Large-Scale] Serious Game-Based Social Leadership Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational leadership concepts and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Social sector leadership training for corporate managers/leaders in a digital device-enabled online learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more conflict management strategies within an organization through serious games.
Learners successfully perform social responsibility decision-making processes in game-based simulations with over 80% success.
Learners develop leadership development plans applicable to real-world work environments through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
